verbs.description: [ARG0: President Trump] [V: lambasted] [ARG1: U.S. immigration policies] [ARGM-TMP: Saturday] , [ARGM-PRD: stating that the U.S. may have to " close up " its borders] . Speaking at a business roundtable in Cleveland , Trump acknowledged that officials are working to repair certain areas of the nation 's border controls , but said the U.S. needs " much more money.""We may have to close up our country to get this straight , " he said , but did not offer more details on the logistics ....
